sdtms-specs.name: ex
sdtms-specs.label: Exposure
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM EX dataset from the CDISC pilot project

sdtms-specs.name: tu_onco_recist
sdtms-specs.label: Tumor Identification (RECIST 1.1) for Oncology
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM TU dataset using RECIST 1.1 intended for examples of ADaM dataset creation
sdtms-specs.author: Stefan Bundfuss

sdtms-specs.name: rs_onco_recist
sdtms-specs.label: Disease Response (RECIST 1.1) for Oncology
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM RS dataset using RECIST 1.1 intended for examples of ADaM dataset creation

sdtms-specs.name: rs_onco_irecist
sdtms-specs.label: Disease Response (iRECIST) for Oncology

sdtms-specs.name: rs_onco_imwg

sdtms-specs.name: rs_onco_ca125
sdtms-specs.label: Disease Response (GCIG)
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM RS dataset using GCIG criteria. The dataset contains just a few patients. It is intended for vignettes and examples of ADaM dataset creation.
sdtms-specs.author: Vinh Nguyen

sdtms-specs.name: supprs_onco_ca125
sdtms-specs.label: Supplemental Qualifiers for RS_ONCO_CA125
sdtms-specs.description: A SDTM supplemental RS dataset using GCIG criteria. It is intended to be used together with `rs_onco_ca125`.
sdtms-specs.author: Vinh Nguyen
